title: Important Advice by Rishabhadeva | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: My actual factual position is to be a servant of the servant of the servant of Krishna.
segments.summary: Rishabhadeva advises his sons about the futility of sense gratification, the temporary nature of the material body, and the importance of understanding one's true identity as a servant of Krishna.
segments.transcript: Rishabhadeva tells his sons that in this material world, the people are engaged in all kinds of sinful activities because they want to satisfy their senses. In my opinion, this is not at all a good thing to do, because this body for which the people are toiling so hard is asat. It is temporary. At the point of death, one has to give up all the results of one's hard work and one has to go. And in the midst of this, we engage in so much enmity with other people. They don't think about the repercussions of their action. It can never satisfy them. After a certain point, they become frustrated, become very renounced, and they start saying, "I am the supreme Brahman." After some time, they will again come back to the material conception.
